segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, while the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water pouring onto the floor, and it makes me so mad that she hasn't noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, and it makes me angry that he's putting himself in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, completely unaware of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of frustration seeing the calm outside and the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how the woman is so absorbed in her task that she can't see what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene captures the anger of feeling helpless and frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Looking at this, I can't help but feel a bit angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene really gets under my skin.
segments.speaker: PAR
